Meliá Palacio de los Duques

Located in the privileged Habsburg district next to The Royal Palace, The Opera House and The Cathedral, Gran Melia Palacio de los Duques is a luxury urban resort. Inspired by Velazquez's masterpieces, this beautiful hotel combines two historic buildings – a 13th-century convent and the 19th-century Palace of Dukes of Granada de Ega – updated in an avant-garde style.

Las Meninas, the Velázquez masterpiece, is the inspiration behind the decor of the rooms at the Gran Meliá Palacio de los Duques. The colour palette favoured by the “artist of all artists”, as Manet called him, the sharp, clean lines and fine textiles that have been used with the greatest of skill to recreate classical elegance with a modern flair. All the rooms feature the latest technology, exquisite furniture and luxurious bathroom details to ensure you enjoy a unique experience of rest, comfort and style in the heart of the Madrid of the Austrias.
